item.title: Career advice and the need for mentoring
item.description: Photo by rawpixel on Unsplash At the ServerlessConf this week, during the lunch break, one young guy approached me and asked for some career advice: “how did you know you wanted to do what you do?

item.title: 30 days challenge!
item.description: Today, I took the resolution to go on a 30-day challenge. And it is not about diet :-) When was my last post? December 31st!!!!! I have plenty of ideas I want to share, plenty of experience other people could (might?
